Uses of Class
edu.rit.swing.DisplayableFrame

  • Packages that use DisplayableFrame 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.draw
    Package edu.rit.draw contains classes and programs for drawing diagrams and slides of all kinds.
    edu.rit.numeric.plot
    Package edu.rit.numeric.plot provides classes and interfaces for plotting data.
    edu.rit.swing
    Package edu.rit.swing contains GUI components designed to work with Java Swing.

    • Uses of DisplayableFrame in edu.rit.draw

      Methods in edu.rit.draw that return DisplayableFrame

      DisplayableFrame Drawing.getFrame()
      Get a displayable frame in which to view this viewable object.
